synopsis.text: Roll Kran, Mia Alice, Lamba Nom, and Pai Thunder, four gifted adolescents with extraordinary psychic abilities, find themselves unwitting pawns in a cosmic power struggle. Manipulated by the enigmatic Dr. Tarsan, they are tasked with piloting the formidable Dangaioh, a colossal robot engineered to thwart the oppressive reign of Captain Galimos and his nefarious Bunker Space Pirates. As the heroes' memories resurface, they harness their unique powers and unite to control Dangaioh, turning the tide against their galactic adversaries. Embark on a thrilling journey of self-discovery and redemption as these psychic warriors strive to protect the universe from the brink of destruction.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
